alert.note: Alert for Garza; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:52PM CDT until June 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LYNN AND SOUTHWESTERN GARZA COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of O`Donnell, or 12 miles south of Tahoka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. Wind gusts between 70 and 80 mph have been measured by the mesonet at O`Donnell. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Post, Tahoka, O`Donnell, Grassland and Justiceburg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
